ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Main navigation class of the system. Contains all the basic travel methods necessary.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Team 2

    • Constructor Detail

      • Driver

        public Driver(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
              EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
              double WHEEL_RADIUS,
              double TRACK,
              Odometer odometer)
        Constructor for driver class.
        Parameters:
        leftMotor - Left wheel's motor created in the MainController class.
        rightMotor - Right wheel's motor created in the MainController class.
        WHEEL_RADIUS - Wheels' radii set in the MainController class.
        TRACK - Track size set in MainController class.
        odometer - Odometer created in the MainController class.
        Since:
        1.1

        public boolean isTraveling()

        Returns:
